agenda_items.title: Confirmation of the Minutes of the 49th BoG Meeting
agenda_items.details: Minutes of the 49th Meeting of the BoG held on November 09, 2019 were confirmed.

agenda_items.title: Actions taken on decisions of the 47th, 48th, and 49th BoG meetings
agenda_items.details: The Board noted the actions taken.

agenda_items.title: Recruitment of Faculty for the posts of Professor

details.decision: The Board accepted the recommendations of the Selection Committee and appointed the following candidates at Pay Level 14A

agenda_items.title: Recruitment of two Technical personnel (contract) for MIS, NITA
agenda_items.details: BoG approved the recruitment of two technical personnel on a contract basis in addition to sanctioned Non-Teaching posts.

agenda_items.title: Recruitment of a Counsellor for students
agenda_items.details: BoG ratified recruitment of a Counsellor at NIT Agartala in addition to sanctioned Non-Teaching posts.

agenda_items.title: Recommendations of the 43rd Building & Works Committee
Temporary engagement of Teaching and Non-Teaching employees
Guidelines for engagement of Visiting Faculty
agenda_items.details: Board approved guidelines. Engagement to be additional to sanctioned posts due to increase in student ratio.

agenda_items.title: Concordance Tables for pensioners of NIT Agartala
agenda_items.details: Board noted status; matter to be processed at Institute level; separate approval not required.

agenda_items.title: Nomination of a Member to the Board of Governors
agenda_items.details: Board ratified nomination of Dr. Soma Nag (Nandi), Assistant Professor, Chemical Engineering Dept., NIT Agartala.

agenda_items.title: Discontinuation of Interviews at Junior Level Posts
agenda_items.details: Board adopted guidelines as per DoPT OM No. 39029/01/2013-Estt (B)-Part, Dec 29, 2015, communicated by Ministry of HRD vide F. No. 35-4/2016-TS.III, Dec 11, 2019.

agenda_items.title: Adoption of guidelines for settlement of compensation claims
agenda_items.details: Guidelines of DoT Memorandum No. 36-11/2015-SR, Dec 5, 2016, approved. Applicable for employees not covered under Group Insurance; superannuated employees excluded.

agenda_items.title: TEQIP-III ongoing program procurement
agenda_items.details: Board approved 4th phase Procurement Plan of Rs. 49,89,440.00.

agenda_items.title: Report of external review committee for academic audit
agenda_items.details: Board perused and approved report. Action Taken Report of last committee to be put in next BoG meeting.

agenda_items.title: Annual Report 2018-19
agenda_items.details: Board approved and confirmed Annual Report 2018-19, incorporating audited accounts by Indian Audit and Accounts Dept., Tripura.

signatories.name: Dr. Govind Bhargava
